EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-09-26-Denver Community Appreciation Event.ES-2017-10-03-Thank-you.EMAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining Turbonomic and Corus360!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HiÂ {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We wanted to personally thank you for joining the Turbonomic and Corus360 teams last week at Coors Field! We has a great time getting to know you with the added benefit of a Rockies win, and we hope you did too! If there is any help that we can provide to you here at Turbonomic, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly, or Chris Keithley <[[mailto:ckeithley@corus360.com]]> at Corus360. On behalf of Turbonomic and Corus360 - thank you!
We hope to see you again soon, Megan
Megan Gay Marketing Program Manager Turbonomic, Inc.
